text_block_list.text: Summer Training Camp had started. Normally, it was an opportunity to focus on training, but――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa! How was Windy-chan's running?! All eyes on the beach should be on me――

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Biko-chan, you're really fired up! Alright, I won't lose to you!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Let's do our best! Just like those three…… I'll definitely master Dirt!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: But they're not! Uuuuugh…… if it's come to this～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: So annoying!! So frustratingーー!! Summer Training Camp is stuuuupid!!
The lack of attention was decreaing her motiviation. The lack of concentration that comes with that……summer was going to be tough.
That's what I thought, but――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Huh? The Summer Festival is on hold?

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… sounds like it overlaps with the Summer Festival in the next town over.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: If they hold it at the same time, people would probably head to the next town anyways, so they weren't going to hold it this year……

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: But, if it's in the next town, we'll have to worry about curfew…… Haaa～ guess we're passing on a Summer Festival this year.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …………Hmmmmm.
I was planning on taking Shinko Windy to the Summer Festival as a reward for training…… but it can't be helped.
Even after it had become night, Shinko Windy hadn't returned to the lodgings.
I was searching for her on a footpath that had no lights. And then――
Kyaaa-!?
Gyaaaa!! S-spare me-!!
From the other side of the forest, more screams could be heard. Did something happen? She didn't get involved, did she?

text_block_list.name: Village Chief
text_block_list.text: Uoooooh～～～～! It's exhilirating! It boggles the mind!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Waaa haa haa haa! C'mon, c'mon, more! There's more fun to be had over here!
Following the lively voices, I came across a row of lights and hand-made flags―― it was a small festival.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hm? Ah, Trainer!! How is it, Windy-chan's festival!? It's really lively, isn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Horse radish in the Takoyaki! A lottery with only one type of prize! And the Stage Event, a Surprise-In-The-Box tournament!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: With the help of Windy-chan's pranks, there's no way this festival would lose～!

text_block_list.name: Villager A
text_block_list.text: Gyaaーーーー!! Ahー, I got the takoyaki with horse radish in it!

text_block_list.name: Villager B
text_block_list.text: Hiiiiii!? What's inside this box? It's so slippery and cold～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: C'mon, c'mon, go on and guess what's inside～♪ Windy-chan's special prank materials are waiting～!

text_block_list.name: Villager C
text_block_list.text: I've never been to a festival like this! There's so much variety!

text_block_list.name: Villager D
text_block_list.text: That's true! Hey, with this, we won't overlap too much with the other town, right? It's almost a completely different thing!

text_block_list.name: Village Chief
text_block_list.text: With the ideas given to us by the Tracen Academy student, there's no reason not to. Right, everyone!?

text_block_list.name: Villagers
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaah!!
The rumors quickly spread through the training camp, and the Uma Musume came one after the other.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Thanks, Windy-chan! I can't help but be excited!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Takoyaki with horse radish, that's Windy-chan's idea!? Amazing!

text_block_list.name: Villager A
text_block_list.text: We never could have come up with anything like this. We'll try to think of something for next year too, thanks!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Ni shi shi♪

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Phew, it's finally over～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Clean up's kind of annoying……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Well of course it was! When it comes to pranks, Windy-chan is a genius! You know that already, right!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……You said it before. Windy-chan's creativity is amazing.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Since I'm the King of Darkness. Of course, the ideas would keep coming.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: But, well…… If Windy-chan didn't use her ideas freely……

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: It would just…… um, right! They would just go to waste! All those ideas!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: That's why, I decided that sharing a few of them wouldn't be such a bad idea.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……In short! Giving prank ideas to those that need them! Make everyone rely on Windy-chan and become her minions!
choice_data_list: There will probably be more now, huh
There will probably be more now, huh

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Now, everyone will need Windy-chan's pranks!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: In that case, we'll be short-staffed so, I'll appoint you as my permanent assistant!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Doesn't that make you happy?
Her face was smug and full of expectations. So I nodded without hesitation.
